Title: ELSA-2024-1822:  java-11-openjdk security update (MODERATE)
Description:
[1:11.0.23.0.9-3.0.1]
- Add Oracle vendor bug URL [Orabug: 34340155]

[1:11.0.23.0.9-2]
- Fix 11.0.22 release date in NEWS

[1:11.0.23.0.9-1]
- Update to jdk-11.0.23+9 (GA)
- Update release notes to 11.0.23+9
- Switch to GA mode for release
- Require tzdata 2024a due to upstream inclusion of JDK-8322725
- Only require tzdata 2023d for now as 2024a is unavailable in buildroot
- ** This tarball is embargoed until 2024-04-16 @ 1pm PT. **
- Resolves: RHEL-30920

[1:11.0.23.0.1-0.1.ea]
- Update to jdk-11.0.23+1 (EA)
- Update release notes to 11.0.23+1
- Switch to EA mode

Criterions.Comment: java-11-openjdk is signed with the Oracle Linux 8 key
